reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED@ALL&VERY DISAPPOINTED
reviews.comment: I thought I was downloading an app of something I could share on fb, but after several attempts I found I have no use for this except to look@it myself, I\'m erasing it&telling ALL who might think about downloading it NOT to waste their time nor space on their phone, smh what purpose does it serve if the only place I can see it is if I open my apps? COMPLETE WASTE OF MY TIME.........really upset by this
reviews.author: Lisa Milner
